question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. umbrella
B. chair behind the lady
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The umbrella is in the foreground, partially covering the scene and appearing larger and more detailed, while the chair behind the lady is further back, clearly in the mid-ground.
